document_data.name: Chardalyn Mephit
document_data.Personality: Chardalyn mephits were particularly cruel. They even timed their deaths to inflict the most damage possible.{{Cite adventurers league/Divining Evil|15}}
document_data.Abilities: Chardalyn mephits had the ability to appear as a shard of chardalyn when not moving. They had the innate ability to replicate the effects of the ''[[fog cloud]]'' spell. Unlike other mephits, their attacks were empowered with [[necrotic energy]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, chardalyn mephits could be found in the cave lair of [[Frostclaw]], an [[awaken]]ed [[snowy owlbear]] who lived in [[Icewind Dale]].{{Cite adventurers league/Divining Evil|13}}
